title: Danzai no Maria -The Exorcism of Maria- Complete Edition

Title: 	Danzai no Maria -The Exorcism of Maria- (Ã¦â€“Â­Ã§Â½ÂªÃ£ï¿½Â®Ã£Æ’Å¾Ã£Æ’ÂªÃ£â€šÂ¢Ã£â‚¬â‚¬THE EXORCISM OF MARIA)
Developer and Publisher: Karin Entertainment
Release Date: 09/27/2013
Language: Japanese 

Description: The story takes place in Japan, in the society that no one believes the presence of God. However, the evil still stays deep inside the society and it is active behind the scenes connected to some people. One day a girl is sent to Japan. She is an official exorcist and her name is Maria. As a matter of fact, she is cursed and will lose her life if she doesn't remove the curse and save humans by the 1st of November. She just hunts devils in front of her to get rid of the curse. What will happen to Maria and boys around her...? - VNDB.org

Features:
- Redrawn art and the additional content from the PSP version
- Content cut from the PSP port
- New opening
- 40 Additional CGs
- New events
- April fool's game "Sengoku no Maria" (accessible from extras menu at the beginning)

NOTE:  This is not the original but the complete edition which has extend features and revamped art different from the original PC version as listed above.

NOTE2: MAKE SURE YOU RUN THIS IN JAP LOCALE!
